0.name: None
0.description: The second player of the trick must always play a card of the current suit, if possible. This is the default.

1.name: King's privilege
1.description: When a player plays a King, the other player must follow with another King, if possible. Otherwise, they must play a card of the current suit.

2.name: Figure privilege
2.description: When a player plays a figure (King/Queen), the other player must follow with the same figure (King/Queen), if possible. Otherwise, they must play a card of the current suit.
